member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GPS
member.summary: A GPS module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GPS.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructs a new instance.
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GPS.PositionReceived
member.summary: Raised when a valid position is received.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GPS.NmeaSentenceReceived
member.summary: Raised when an NMEA sentence is received. This is for advanced users who want to parse the NMEA sentences themselves.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GPS.InvalidPositionReceived
member.summary: Raised when an invalid position is received.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GPS.Enabled
member.summary: Enables or disables the GPS.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GPS.LastPosition
member.summary: The last valid position received.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GPS.LastValidPositionAge
member.summary: The time elapsed since the last position was received.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GPS.PositionReceivedHandler
member.summary: Represents the delegate that is used to handle the PositionReceived event
member.param: The object that raised the event.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GPS.NmeaSentenceReceivedHandler
member.summary: Represents the delegate that is used to handle the NMEASentenceReceived event
member.param: The object that raised the event.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GPS.InvalidPositionReceivedHandler
member.summary: Represents the delegate that is used to handle the InvalidPositionReceived event
member.param: The object that raised the event.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GPS.Position
member.summary: Represents a GPS position.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GPS.Position.ToString
member.summary: Provides a formatted string for this Position.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GPS.Position.Latitude
member.summary: The latitude.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GPS.Position.Longitude
member.summary: The longitude.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GPS.Position.LatitudeString
member.summary: A string representing the latitude, in the format ddmm.mmmm H, where dd = degrees, mm.mmm = minutes and fractional minutes, and H = hemisphere (N/S).

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GPS.Position.LongitudeString
member.summary: A string representing the longitude, in the format ddmm.mmmm H, where dd = degrees, mm.mmm = minutes and fractional minutes, and H = hemisphere (E/W).

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GPS.Position.SpeedKnots
member.summary: Speed over the ground in knots.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GPS.Position.CourseDegrees
member.summary: Course over the ground in degrees.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.GPS.Position.FixTimeUtc
member.summary: The Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) time of the fix.
